statements: SELECT * FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT * FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE location='Lab A' ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%' ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_id, location FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE location IN ('Lab A', 'Lab B') ORDER BY location, equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM laboratory_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Micro%' AND equipment_name NOT LIKE '%Kit%' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment_inventory WHERE manufacturer = 'Sony';
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY maintenance_schedule DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 101 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%routine%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE manufacturer='Company A' AND maintenance_schedule='Monthly';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_description FROM equipment_inventory e LEFT JOIN maintenance_logs m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment, AVG(equipment_id) AS avg_equipment_id FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, purchase_date, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT equipment_id, status FROM Equipment_Status WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL AND status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, s.status FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id INNER JOIN Equipment_Status s ON e.equipment_id = s.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_id HAVING total_maintenance > 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number, location FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_frequency = 'Quarterly';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, technician FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;
SELECT maintenance_type, technician, comments FROM maintenance_log JOIN technicians ON maintenance_log.technician = technicians.technician_name WHERE technicians.specialty='HVAC';
SELECT equipment_id, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_frequency='quarterly' ORDER BY next_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Equipment ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT technician_name, department FROM Technicians INNER JOIN Departments ON Technicians.department = Departments.department_name;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_type, m.description FROM Equipment e INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.technician_name, d.department_name FROM Technicians t JOIN Departments d ON t.department = d.department_name;
SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS total_logs FROM Equipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLogs l ON e.equipment_id = l.schedule_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING total_logs > 2;
